movies.Description: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

movies.Title: Doctor Strange
movies.Description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.
movies.Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Rachel McAdams, Benedict Wong

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him, but he soon finds himself targeted by a ruthless criminal underworld.
movies.Actors: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Willem Dafoe

movies.Title: The Notebook
movies.Description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated due to their social differences.
movies.Actors: Gena Rowlands, James Garner, Rachel McAdams, Ryan Gosling

movies.Title: The Avengers
movies.Description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

movies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler

movies.Title: Inception
movies.Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe

movies.Title: Pulp Fiction
movies.Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.Actors: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis

movies.Title: The Dark Knight
movies.Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
